name: Frozen Land Bubble Shooter
description:
Frozen Land Bubble Shooter!!!
Shoot bubbles and blast your way through all the levels!
This game is a classic bubble shooter and this means that you have to form groups of 3 or more bubbles of the same color and they disappear.
This game's goal is to finish all the bubbles on the screen.
[Features]
- Puzzle mode, use the limited bubbles to clear all the bubbles on the screen.
- Arcade mode, clear all the descending bubbles.
- Beautiful scenes of the jungle.
